gods_and_mages_engine.Items

Class BaseItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gods_and_mages_engine.Items.BaseItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EquipableItem, KeyItem, UsableItem

    public class BaseItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for all item classes, to implement shared shared fields and methods.

    Allows all item objects to be stored in the same collections. Items that do not fit into any implemented categories can use BaseItem directly.
